list.name: site_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT site_type::text FROM monitoring.sites ORDER BY 1;

list.name: site
list.query: SELECT description FROM monitoring.sites WHERE site_type::text LIKE '${site_type}' ORDER BY 1;

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(f.event_start_timestamp, $__interval),
  SUM(COALESCE(f.energy_wh,0)) AS value
FROM monitoring.fact_site_event f
JOIN monitoring.sites s ON s.site_id = f.site_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(f.event_start_timestamp)
  AND s.site_type::text LIKE '${site_type}'
  AND s.description LIKE '${site}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(f.event_start_timestamp, $__interval),
  AVG(COALESCE(f.CI_g,0)) AS "CI_g",
  AVG(COALESCE(f.CFP_g,0)) AS "CFP_g"
FROM monitoring.fact_site_event f
JOIN monitoring.sites s ON s.site_id = f.site_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(f.event_start_timestamp)
  AND s.site_type::text LIKE '${site_type}'
  AND s.description LIKE '${site}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  f.event_id,
  s.site_type::text AS site_type,
  s.description AS site,
  f.owner,
  f.execunitid,
  f.event_start_timestamp,
  f.event_end_timestamp,
  f.energy_wh,
  f.work,
  f.CI_g,
  f.CFP_g,
  f.PUE,
  f.status
FROM monitoring.fact_site_event f
JOIN monitoring.sites s ON s.site_id = f.site_id
WHERE s.site_type::text LIKE '${site_type}'
  AND s.description LIKE '${site}'
ORDER BY f.event_start_timestamp DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 200;

panels.title: Top sites by energy (Wh) in range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  s.description AS site,
  SUM(COALESCE(f.energy_wh,0)) AS energy_wh
FROM monitoring.fact_site_event f
JOIN monitoring.sites s ON s.site_id = f.site_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(f.event_start_timestamp)
  AND s.site_type::text LIKE '${site_type}'
GROUP BY s.description
ORDER BY energy_wh DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(f.event_start_timestamp, $__interval),
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM monitoring.fact_site_event f
JOIN monitoring.sites s ON s.site_id = f.site_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(f.event_start_timestamp)
  AND s.site_type::text LIKE '${site_type}'
  AND s.description LIKE '${site}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;
